entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
